description:
Hey extreme racer, your task is simple - leave your opponents behind in puffs of smoke and get to the finish line first! The more victories, the more new tracks and cool sports cars. Get into a charged sports car and show everyone what extreme racing means!

The vehicle is controlled using the Joy-Con™️. Win extreme races to unlock new tracks and cars!

Key features:
• Lots of tracks with varying difficulty;
• Powerful sports cars with incredible speed!
• Mad dynamics of extreme racing!
• Management with the controller Joy-Con™️;
name: Extreme Highway Racing: Real Speed Driver
